"How to use a FUN Scratch Ticket":
"ARKS is full of people who don't know
how to have a little fun, if you ask me.
Once you've earned enough FUN, use it
on a FUN Scratch Ticket. That's just
basic protocol, and extremely important
to boot. There are some conditions for
playing FUN Scratch Tickets, but the
rewards can be quite considerable.
"

"昨今は、控えめなアークスが多くて困る！
ＦＵＮを貯めたらＦＵＮスクラッチで使う！
これは基本的かつ重要なことだ！

ＦＵＮスクラッチは使用に条件があるぶん
相応の結果が期待できる
すばらしいものなのだぞ！

いいか、私はＦＵＮスクラッチで……"
